directions: Whisk together vinegar, juice, soy sauce, honey, and ginger in a small bowl. Add oil slowly, whisking constantly until incorporated.
Put kale in a large bowl. Drizzle with dressing, and mix well. Using your hands, massage kale until softened, wilted, and reduced in volume by about half.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) bunches lacinato kale, stems removed, leaves thinly sliced
title: Honey-Ginger Kale Salad
